headline: Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) Sets Third Quarter Dividend at US$0.63 Per Share
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) recently saw a 3% price increase over the last quarter, which followed the declaration of a $0.63 per-share dividend for the third quarter of 2025. This announcement provided stability amid broader market fluctuations, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq experiencing declines from record highs. Additionally, changes in PEG’s corporate governance structure may have influenced investor sentiment. The company's performance held steady against a backdrop of mixed...
